metadata.title: CVE-2017-17513 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - negligible
metadata.description: TeX Live through 20170524 does not validate strings before launching theprogram specified by the BROWSER environment variable, which might allowremote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via a crafted URL,related to linked_scripts/context/stubs/unix/mtxrun,texmf-dist/scripts/context/stubs/mswin/mtxrun.lua, andtexmf-dist/tex/luatex/lualibs/lualibs-os.lua.

criterions.comment: texlive-base package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
context package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
texlive-bin package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
